nodes.text: Ota was a male Bothan who worked to stop Teemo the Hutt from acquiring weapons from the Geonosian Duke Piddock under the orders of his rival Duke Dimmock.
Ota was designed by Dave Allen and Daniel Lovat Clark for The Long Arm of the Hutt, a supplement Star Wars: Edge of the Empire that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2012.
